“Blending statistical rigor with practical data solutions”



What we do

  • Advanced statistical modeling

  • Predictive analytics

  • Custom data science applications and software tools

  • Dynamic reporting processes


Guided by what works

We combine a pragmatic problem-solving approach with flexible, open-source data science tools like R, Python, Shiny and Quarto to tailor analyses and solutions to the heart of the problem, adding complexity and rigorous statistical considerations as needed. These principles apply in research and business contexts.


Our process

We'll have a 30-60 minute meeting to understand your project goals and determine if it's the right fit.

We'll develop a statement of work detailing agreed upon timelines and key deliverables.

Here's where the magic happens. We'll execute on the planned data analysis or software solution, working iteratively with you to ensure incremental progress toward the end goal.

We use Posit Connect Cloud to host applications, interactive reports, and other analytical content to make access seamless on any device. Project source code is stored on GitHub to elicit collaboration and provide transparency and ownership over developed solutions.

Example application   Example report

Need an alternative mode of delivery? No problem! We can work with you to determine the right end-product to meet your needs.

Pricing

Our base rate is $150 per hour, with discounts available depending on the number of hours committed, and for individuals. We can also price at the project-level when it makes sense.
